titleStmt.title: The second part of Vox populi, or Gondomar appearing in the likenes of Matchiauell in a Spanish parliament wherein are discouered his treacherous & subtile practises to the ruine as well of England, as the Netherlandes faithfully transtated [sic] out of the Spanish coppie by a well-willer to England and Holland.
Vox populi. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A11808 of text S116994 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 22104). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A11808 of text S116994 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 22104). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

notesStmt.note: Dedication initialed: T.S. of V., i.e. Thomas Scott of Utrecht.

A forgery of STC 22103.7, printed by William Jones (STC). The title page has a donkey litter to the left of Gondomar's head, with motto "Simul complectar omina [sic]". D3v line 1 begins "of Buckinghams ..".

Structure of first quires is obscure. A1 (title page) is followed by dedication (a 2-leaf insert signed [² ]A1-2); A2 has illustration and beginning of text. Leaves continue "A3", unsigned, B1-3. STC says the unsigned leaf is B1 and B2-4 are missigned 1-3, in which case ¹A4 is unaccounted for and apparently cancelled. Pagination is continuous. Quire F should be bound 4, 1, 2, 3.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
